job.title: Data Scientist (Predictive Analytics)
job.description: <p>Focus Capital is supporting its&nbsp;health technology group by providing an effective Data Scientist who will work to develop state-of-the-art predictive analytic data models to optimize revenue opportunities for the marketing and sales teams.</p><p><br></p><p>This ideal candidate must be technical and capable of driving digital innovation among the data engineers, while also capable of interfacing with business stakeholders and conducting predictive models.</p><p><br></p><p>This role will start remotely, however at some point in the future we will want someone who can come in once every 10-15 days. Therefore, you must be local to NY or NJ or open to relocating.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>The total compensation and benefits offered are completely unmatched in the industry.</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:&nbsp;</strong></p><ul><li>3+ years as a data scientist</li><li>Experience building predictive models in Python and its frameworks (i.e. Pandas, PySpark, etc)</li><li>Professional experience deploying machine learning models.</li><li>Prior experience with Spark and SQL.</li><li>Experience with Random Forest, Logistic Regression, Linear Regression, supervised and unsupervised models, etc</li><li>Experience in a cloud environment (i.e. AWS or Azure)</li><li>Azure Databricks experience is a plus</li><li>Ability to translate complex mathematical models and data science concepts into business decisions (and vice versa)</li><li>Masters degree in computer science, statistics or engineering (or 5+ years of experience).</li></ul>
